channel.title: sql on 酷卡派
channel.description: Recent content in sql on 酷卡派

item.title: sql语句里的条件语句
item.description: sql语句里的条件选择主要是用到 …… case when …… end 1 SELECT * FROM tp_wl_job j WHERE ( addtime > case when contacts='1周' then 1585626783 when contacts='1个月' then 1583553183 when contacts='6个月' then 1570420383 when contacts='长期' then 0 end ) ORDER BY id desc LIMIT 0,40
